div.class: entry fix post-7 page type-page status-publish hentry

a.span: Click Here for INFORMATION on the STATE of EMERGENCY issued by Roy Cooper
Click here for Remote Learning Information and links for each school

div.p: The Camden County Schools have a long tradition of student academic success. The Camden County School system is consistently ranked among the highest achieving school systems in North Carolina. The system strives to serve each student with high-quality instruction focused on the skills necessary for success in the college or career path of choice. The Camden County Schools administration and staff are committed to providing your child with a quality education. We also need your support and invite you to assist us in our quest for excellence by participating in school activities, attending parent-teacher conferences and monitoring your child’s homework on a daily basis. We look forward to working with you to make the 2019-2020 school year a successful one for your child.

Update from Governor Cooper\u2019s office 3/23/2020:\u00a0Executive Order to close K-12 public school statewide through May 15, bans mass gatherings over 50 people, closes some businesses. Governor Cooper has announced that all NC Public Schools will be closed for at least two weeks beginning Monday, March 16.
